CustomField.description: When checked, causes the sync of data back to the NPSP org to also update the User record for the Patient to use a new email address. This will cause an email to be send to the Patient informing them of their new email address and asking them to confirm.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Checking this box will cause the Patient's Community Login Email address to also be changed - this will then email the Patient asking them to confirm the address change.
If Unchecked, the email address will only update the Contact records, not the Patient's login information.
CustomField.label: Also change community login?
